lcvt_test
31-Mar-2004 07:20:45

LCVT_PRB
  Test the FORTRAN90 LCVT routines.

TEST01
  CVT computes a Centroidal Voronoi Tessellation.
  RTABLE_LATINIZE makes it a Latin Hypersquare.

  In this test, we vary the sampling used during the
  CVT Latin iteration.

  Spatial dimension M =        2
  Number of generators =       25
  Initial random number seed = 123456789

  Initialize using UNIFORM.
  Sample using RANDOM (MATLAB intrinsic).
  Number of sample points = 100000
  Number of sample steps =  50

  STEP  L2 Change

   1   0.314246
   2   0.103141
   3   0.055708
   4   0.041903
   5   0.036057
   6   0.032250
   7   0.033957
   8   0.030683
   9   0.032709
  10   0.027487
  11   0.027038
  12   0.025283
  13   0.023858
  14   0.019452
  15   0.018546
  16   0.017240
  17   0.015567
  18   0.013389
  19   0.014496
  20   0.010304
  21   0.009829
  22   0.011664

TEST01
  CVT computes a Centroidal Voronoi Tessellation.
  RTABLE_LATINIZE makes it a Latin Hypersquare.

  In this test, we vary the sampling used during the
  CVT Latin iteration.

  Spatial dimension M =        2
  Number of generators =       25
  Initial random number seed = 123456789

  Initialize using UNIFORM.
  Sample using UNIFORM.
  Number of sample points = 100000
  Number of sample steps =  50

  STEP  L2 Change

   1   0.312474
   2   0.105229
   3   0.057077

TEST01
  CVT computes a Centroidal Voronoi Tessellation.
  RTABLE_LATINIZE makes it a Latin Hypersquare.

  In this test, we vary the sampling used during the
  CVT Latin iteration.

  Spatial dimension M =        2
  Number of generators =       25
  Initial random number seed = 123456789

  Initialize using UNIFORM.
  Sample using HALTON.
  Number of sample points = 100000
  Number of sample steps =  50

  STEP  L2 Change

   1   0.313709
   2   0.103967
   3   0.055809
   4   0.040693
   5   0.035751
   6   0.035253
   7   0.035543
   8   0.032250
   9   0.028541
  10   0.026049
  11   0.024934
  12   0.022688
  13   0.020879
  14   0.018426
  15   0.015865
  16   0.013686
  17   0.012200
  18   0.010608
  19   0.009798
  20   0.008726
  21   0.008004
  22   0.007694
  23   0.007017
  24   0.006917
  25   0.006937
  26   0.006641
  27   0.006681
  28   0.006831
  29   0.006402
  30   0.006128
  31   0.005799

TEST01
  CVT computes a Centroidal Voronoi Tessellation.
  RTABLE_LATINIZE makes it a Latin Hypersquare.

  In this test, we vary the sampling used during the
  CVT Latin iteration.

  Spatial dimension M =        2
  Number of generators =       25
  Initial random number seed = 123456789

  Initialize using UNIFORM.
  Sample using GRID.
  Number of sample points = 100000
  Number of sample steps =  50

TEST02
  CVT computes a Centroidal Voronoi Tessellation.
  RTABLE_LATINIZE makes it a Latin Hypersquare.

  In this test, we initialize the generators to
  grid points; this is an unstable CVT solution.

  Spatial dimension M =        2
  Number of generators =       25
  Initial random number seed = 123456789

  USER will initialize data.
  Sample using UNIFORM.
  Number of sample points = 100000
  Number of sample steps =  50

  Initial generators (rows):

               1         2

     1  0.100000  0.100000
     2  0.100000  0.300000
     3  0.100000  0.500000
     4  0.100000  0.700000

    17  0.700000  0.300000

    24  0.900000  0.700000

  STEP  L2 Change

   1   0.006640
